sqlMap.select: order by table_index,date_isusse asc
sqlMap.insert: insert TB_TABLE_INFO( table_id, port_col, vsl_row, othercell, company_abbr, page, bookPage, table_index, out_port, out_to_port, in_port, in_to_port, agent, title, quark_format, common_shipping, gubun, console_cfs, d_time, c_time, console_page, inland_indexs ) values( #table_id#, #port_col#, #vsl_row#, #othercell#, #company_abbr#, #page#, #bookPage#, #table_index#, #out_port#, #out_to_port#, #in_port#, #in_to_port#, #agent#, #title#, #quark_format#, #common_shipping#, #gubun#, #console_cfs#, #d_time#, #c_time#, #console_page#, #inland_indexs# )
sqlMap.delete: delete from TB_TABLE_INFO where table_index=#table_index# and company_abbr=#company_abbr# and table_id=#table_id#
sqlMap.update:
update TB_TABLE_INFO set table_id=#table_id#
port_col=#port_col#
vsl_row=#vsl_row#
othercell=#othercell#
page=#page#
bookPage=#bookPage#
quark_format=#quark_format#
title=#title#
company_abbr=#company_abbr#
agent=#agent#
table_index=#table_index#
company_name=#company_name#
common_shipping=#common_shipping#
out_to_port=#out_to_port#
in_to_port=#in_to_port#
out_port=#out_port#
in_port=#in_port#
gubun=#gubun#
gubun=#gubun#
console_cfs=#console_cfs#
console_page=#console_page#
inland_indexs=#inland_indexs#
c_time=#c_time#
d_time=#d_time#
where table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_INFO set
date_isusse = NULL
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
where table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_INFO set
date_isusse = NULL
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_INFO set
port_col=#port_col#
where table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_INFO set
vsl_row=#vsl_row#
where table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_INFO set
date_isusse = NULL
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
where table_id=#table_id#
sqlMap.select: where table_id=#table_id#
where company_abbr=#company_abbr# and date_isusse=#date_isusse#
select * from TB_COMPANY

select TB_COMPANY.company_abbr, TB_TABLE_INFO.date_isusse from TB_COMPANY,TB_TABLE_INFO where TB_COMPANY.company_abbr=TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr
TB_TABLE_INFO.date_isusse =#date_isusse#
group by TB_COMPANY.company_abbr
select * from TB_COMPANY order by page
select *, select count(*) TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where TB_TABLE_PORTLIST.table_id=TB_TABLE.table_id as r_port_col from TB_TABLE_INFO where company_abbr=#company_abbr# order by table_index
select * from TB_TABLE_INFO where page=#page# order by table_index
group by date_isusse

select TB_COMPANY.company_abbr, (select count(table_id) from TB_TABLE_INFO where TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr=TB_COMPANY.company_abbr) as tableCount, TB_TABLE_INFO.page from TB_COMPANY,TB_TABLE_INFO,tb_page_info where TB_COMPANY.company_abbr=TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr group by TB_COMPANY.company_abbr,TB_TABLE_INFO.page order by TB_TABLE_INFO.page

select * , (select count(*) from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where TB_TABLE_PORTLIST.table_id=TB_TABLE_INFO.table_id) as r_port_col from TB_TABLE_INFO where TB_TABLE_INFO.page>=#start# and
TB_TABLE_INFO.page<=#end#
order by page

select TB_TABLE_INFO.table_id, TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr, TB_TABLE_INFO.table_index, TB_TABLE_INFO.date_isusse, TB_TABLE_INFO.quark_format, TB_TABLE_INFO.TS, TB_TABLE_INFO.title, TB_TABLE_INFO.page
TB_TABLE_INFO.vsl_row
TB_TABLE_INFO.port_col
from TB_TABLE_INFO
TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr =#company_abbr#
order by TB_TABLE_INFO.page, TB_TABLE_INFO.table_index

select * , (select count(*) from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where TB_TABLE_PORTLIST.table_id=TB_TABLE_INFO.table_id) as r_port_col from TB_TABLE_INFO
TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr =#company_abbr#
TB_TABLE_INFO.page =#page#
order by TB_TABLE_INFO.page, TB_TABLE_INFO.table_index

select page from TB_TABLE_INFO
TB_TABLE_INFO.company_abbr =#company_abbr#
group by page

select company_abbr from TB_TABLE_INFO
TB_TABLE_INFO.page =#page#
group by company_abbr
select max(table_index) from TB_TABLE_INFO where company_abbr=#company_abbr#
select * from TB_TABLE_INFO
select page, company_abbr from TB_TABLE_INFO group by page, company_abbr

select * from TB_TABLE_INFO where page=#page#
date_isusse=#date_isusse#
order by table_index
select * from TB_TABLE_INFO

select * from TB_TABLE_INFO
table_id = #table_id#
page = #page#
table_index = #table_index#
company_abbr = #company_abbr#
title = #title#
agent = #agent#
gubun = #gubun#
order by page, table_index
select * from TB_TABLE_INFO where company_abbr=#company_abbr# and table_index = #table_index# and page=#page#
select * from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where port_type='P' and table_id=#table_id# order by port_index

select * from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where table_id=#table_id#
port_name =#port_name#
port_type =#port_type#
parent_port = #parent_port#
port_index = #port_index#
order by port_index
sqlMap.delete:
delete from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where table_id=#table_id#
parent_port = #parent_port#
port_name =#port_name#
port_type =#port_type#
port_index=#port_index#
sqlMap.select: select * from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where table_id=#table_id# and port_index=#port_index#
sqlMap.update:
update TB_TABLE_PORTLIST set
port_index=#port_index#
port_name= #port_name#
parent_port= #parent_port#
where table_id=#table_id#
port_index = #port_index#
port_type= #port_type#
sqlMap.select: select * from TB_TABLE_INFO where company_abbr=#company_abbr# and page=#page# order by table_index
select max(port_index) from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where table_id=#table_id# and port_type='P'
sqlMap.update:
update TB_TABLE_PORTLIST set
port_index=port_index+1
port_name= #port_name#
parent_port= #parent_port#
where table_id=#table_id#
port_index >= #port_index#
#new_port_index# > port_index
port_type= #port_type#
sqlMap.select: select count(table_id) FROM TB_TABLE_INFO where date_isusse=#date_isusse#
select * from TB_TABLE_PROPERTY
select * from TB_TABLE_PROPERTY where company_abbr=#company_abbr# and page=#page#
sqlMap.update:
update TB_TABLE_PROPERTY set
voyage=#voyage#
table_type=#table_type#
vesselvoydivider=#vesselvoydivider#
vesselvoycount=#vesselvoycount#
under_port=#under_port#
company_abbr=#company_abbr#
page=#page#
port_type=#port_type#
port_type=0
eta=#eta#
where table_id=#table_id#

update TB_TABLE_PORTLIST set
port_index=#new_port_index#
where table_id=#table_id#
port_index = #port_index#
port_type= #port_type#
port_name= #port_name#

update TB_TABLE_PORTLIST set
port_name=#new_port_name#
where table_id=#table_id#
port_index = #port_index#
port_type= #port_type#
port_name= #port_name#
sqlMap.sql:
select *, (select count(*) from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where TB_TABLE_PORTLIST.table_id=TB_TABLE_INFO.table_id) as r_port_col from TB_TABLE_INFO where date_isusse=#date_isusse#
company_abbr= #company_abbr#
gubun= #gubun#
page= #page#
sqlMap.select: and gubun NOT IN ('NNN')
select * from TB_TABLE_INFO where agent=#agent# order by page, table_index
select agent from TB_TABLE_INFO where page=#page# group by agent
select COUNT(*) from (select port_index from TB_TABLE_PORTLIST where table_id=#table_id# group by port_index) as t
select date_isusse from TB_TABLE_INFO group by date_isusse order by date_isusse desc
SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME LIKE 'TB_%'
SELECT column_name, data_type FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE TABLE_NAME=#table#;
SELECT * FROM $table_name$;

SELECT * FROM TB_INLAND_SCHEDULE_INFO;
SELECT * FROM TB_MEMBER;
SELECT * FROM TB_MEBER;
SELECT * FROM TB_PORT_ABBR;
SELECT * FROM TB_SCHEDULE_INFO;

SELECT * FROM TB_TABLE_PORTLIST;
SELECT * FROM TB_TABLE_PROPERTY;
SELECT * FROM TB_VESSEL;
